title: The Galaxy Tab S8 Ultra was Samsung’s surprise hit as Galaxy S22 pre-orders break records
content:
Samsung has been in a bit of a rut for the past few years when it comes to its smartphone lineup, with each successive Galaxy S flagship struggling to beat or even match previous entries. However, it seems the Galaxy S22 and Galaxy Tab S8 have struck a chord with buyers, as Samsung says pre-orders have broken records.

more…

The post The Galaxy Tab S8 Ultra was Samsung’s surprise hit as Galaxy S22 pre-orders break records appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Samsung says it broke pre-order records with its new Galaxy S22 and Galaxy Tab S8 devices, with the Tab S8 Ultra being the surprise hit.
